com.ftm.iamweb.services

Class AbstractFacade<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ftm.iamweb.services.AbstractFacade<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - any object
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IdentityFacade

    public abstract class AbstractFacade<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that use a dao implementation, previously injected via Spring
    Author:
    Favio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void create(T entity)
      Invoke DAO.create to persist an object in the database
      void edit(T entity)
      Invoke DAO.update to modify an object in the database
      T find(T entity)
      Invoke DAO.searchUnique to find one record in the database base on the criteria passed with entity object
      java.util.List<T> findAll()
      Invoke DAO.readAll to find all the occurrences in the database

      Invoke DAO.delete to delete one record in the database
